error.generic: Something went wrong. Please contact support.
error.TIME_OUT: The operation has timed out. Please try again.
error.CONNECTION_ERROR: The connection to the server has failed. Please check the connection and try again.

boardMembers.allPasswordsSet: All passwords are set, please continue.

passwordPolicy.instruction: The password must at least satisfy this policy:
passwordPolicy.digit: It must contain at least 1 digit.
passwordPolicy.specialChar: It must contain at least 1 special character.
passwordPolicy.lowerCaseChar: It must contain at least 1 lowercase character.
passwordPolicy.uppercaseChar: It must contain at least 1 uppercase character.
passwordPolicy.confirmed: It must match the "Confirm" password input.

error.invalid: The password you entered is invalid.

authorizations.emptyRegular: There are no regular ballot boxes configured.
authorizations.emptyTest: There are no test ballot boxes configured.
authorizations.name: Name

preConfigure.confirmation: I confirm that all the information is correct.

pageActions.instruction: Please validate the Election event and start the preconfiguration.

error.DEFAULT: The preconfiguration of the election event has failed. Please try again.
error.LOADING_SUMMARY_ERROR: The loading of the election event summary has failed. Please try again.
error.IO_EXCEPTION: The file could not be read. Please check the file and try again.
error.UNCHECKED_IO_EXCEPTION: The file upload has failed. Please check that the input folder exists and try again.

error.DEFAULT: The pre-computation of the verification card sets has failed. Please try again.
error.NEGATIVE_CHUNK_SIZE: The pre-computation could not be started. Please check the chunk size and try again.

error.DEFAULT: The export of the election event has failed. Please try again.
error.BAD_SDM_OUTPUT_FOLDER_PATH: The file could not be written. Please check the output folder path and try again.
error.OUTPUT_FOLDER_MISSING: The export has failed. Please check that the output folder exists and try again.

import.instruction: Please select the corresponding import file to continue the process.

pageActions.instruction: Please select to requested import file

error.DEFAULT: The import of the election event has failed. Please try again.
error.CHECK_ZIP_PASSWORD: The import of the election event has failed. Please check the zip password and try again.
error.USB_DIRECTORY_NOT_EXIST: The import of the election event has failed. Please check that the USB directory exists and try again.
error.IMPORT_STEP_NOT_EXIST: The import content does not correspond to a valid import. Please check the import content and try again.
error.IMPORT_CONTENT_NOT_MATCH_CURRENT_IMPORT_: The import content does not match the current import step. Please check the import content and try again.
error.IMPORT_CONTENT_NOT_MATCH_CURRENT_ELECTIO: The import content does not match the current election event. Please check the import content and try again.
The import content does not match the current election event seed. Please check the import content and try again.

overallSection.title: Overall

policy.instruction: The seed value should match the following format: CT_YYYYMMDD_XY01.
policy.prefix: CT: cantonal abbreviation, for example SG, TG...
policy.suffix: XY01: Test to Test (TT) / Test to Prod (TP) / Prod to Prod (PP), followed by ascending sequence number.
policy.delimiter: An underscore "_" delimiter between each part.

overallSection.mode: Mode of the Secure Data Manager
